$item_eikthyr_bow_description: A bow forged in the Eikthyr Power.
$item_elder_bow_description: From the wood of the Elder, this bow will help you throug the hardest times in the swamps.
$item_bonemass_bow_description: How this bow can look so cute when you know where it come from.

$item_yagluth_bow_description: You can impale Seeker with this one.
$item_queen_bow_description: You feel the queen protect you now.
$item_fader_bow_description: From the ashes of Fader, this bow will empower you and get you prepared for the Deep North...

$se_lightningshot_tooltip: You deal pure lightning shot and this can spread through your ennemies.
$se_chainpoison_name: 30% chance to apply a chain of poison.
$se_poisonshot_tooltip: You deal massive poison aoe damage with this bow.
$se_fireshot_tooltip: Yes, fire burns. You'll learn it one day.
